user_machine_keyword_test._comment: null (use machine.json default), str (shortcut used in machine.json (ex: v100), list of str (project,allocation,arch, ex [myproject,myalloc,v100])

deepmd_model_version._comment: float, values: 2.0 or 2.1 or 2.2, -1 will take the highest dptrain_VERSION.json in the user_files folder
